long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amzing Light is an extension developed for Google Chrome browsers. With its help it is much easier for users to find the desired product on Amazon. The extension in question is free and does not require any subscriptions to use.
What is it for?
The Amzing Light extension is designed to make it easy to find products that are on sale on Amazon. The sequence of actions is as follows.
1.	The user specifies through the extension the name of the product to be found, selects his region.
2.	Clicks the search button.
3.	After that the extension will automatically search and present you several variants of pages, where the found product is on sale.
All you have to do is to go to the page and read more about the product. The great advantage of the software product is the efficiency of the search. The user saves time, as he does not have to manually save the picture from the site to then separately insert it into the search engine and find the results.
